name: Don't Croak
description:
Here's the feedback form!: https://forms.gle/k6BNQa3WXg1oV9xc8

DONT CROAK

Played exclusively with your mouse! All buttons are used on screen.

There are a total of three secret rooms, and one secret ending! See if you can get them all :)

Struggling? Here are some Tips!

:SPOILER WARNING:

:SPOILER WARNING:

  • Hitting an enemy as their attack starts, will cancel the enemies attack!
  • The spear does less damage than the sword, but it also attacks faster.
  • The pickaxe opens secret rooms, try hitting using it in the room you found it.
  • Last of all, take it slow! Take some time to think critically and look around.
